frontmatter.title: Comparing Traefik2 with Traefik
frontmatter.description: Traefik2 is a significant change from Traefik. How do the both compare? I have ported an old setup to the new format

frontmatter.title: Setting up Traefik
frontmatter.description: Traefik is a cloud native reverse proxy. I want to show how to do load balancing, SSL termination, routing and Mutual TLS with it
